channel.title: Projects on Cathy Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Cathy Nguyen

item.title: Project 2: Modeling, Testing, and Predicting
item.description: Introduction The Center of Systemic Peace (CSP) engages in political violence research and continually monitors political behavior in world states (independent countries with a population greater than 500,000). The Integrated Network for Societal Conflict Research (INSCR) coordinates the information produced y the CSP. I combined two of their datasets, Forcibly Displaced Populations and Major Episodes of Political Violence, for information in the year 2001. Both datasets identified countries by a standard 3-letter alpha country identifier code.

item.title: Project 1: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: Introduction The college sports industry is immense. In 2019, the NCAA athletics departments generated a total of $18.9 billion in 2019. For this project, I evaluated the athletic departments of both public two-year and four-year institutions in Texas. The Equity in Athletics Data Analysis (EADA) provides athletics data from all co-educational postsecondary institutions that receive Title IV funding and have an intercollegiate athletics program. The EADA used was for the 2018-2019 academic school year.
